channel.title: I need help with setting up a lan server
channel.description:
Obviously im stupid... I just can't seem to do it. I've even searched, no luck with that.
My questions are:
Whats IP's have to be set and what IP do I need? My routers IP or my computers IP?
Do I need port fowarding?
And thats it.
It's for me and siblings to mess around with. Cannot get it working at all... im sort of unexperienced in this area. Help would be greatly appriciated. If you could, maybe take it step by step?
My siblings cannot connect to my server.

item.title: I need help with setting up a lan server
item.dc:creator: @lokar lokar
item.description:
@lokar wrote:

When you talk about fowarding ports, do you have a guide for it?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 25, 2009, 06:24:52 pm[/size][hr]Double post.

I can’t get it working even with port fowarding… I cannot connect to it, nor can my siblings.

I have no clue what it is.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 25, 2009, 07:09:35 pm[/size][hr]Any help at all?

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with setting up a lan server
